title: HAP 110 - Politics with Bloodshed - the Black Panthers
itunes:title: HAP 110 - Politics with Bloodshed - the Black Panthers
description: The philosophical underpinnings of a “vanguard of revolution” led by Huey P. Newton, Bobby Seale, and Eldridge Cleaver: the Black Panther Party.
content:encoded: The philosophical underpinnings of a “vanguard of revolution” led by Huey P. Newton, Bobby Seale, and Eldridge Cleaver: the Black Panther Party.
